item.title: WISE Conference in Doha: Artificial Intelligence Will Change the Future of Education in the World
item.description: What form of education looks forward? Will artificial intelligence eliminate the role of teachers? Such questions and others were the subjects of the interventions of participants at the WISE 10th World Education Innovation Summit on Wednesday, entitled “Learn again, what does it mean to be a human being?
